Content.Text:
<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <PARENT>. I've grown so much
that it's harder to walk around the
house now.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Good morning, <PARENT>. I was surprised
when I looked in the mirror. I saw a
strange guy in front of me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Then I thought about it and realized I
was looking at myself. It's going to
take awhile to get used to this.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning, <PARENT>. Now that I'm this
big I get really hungry. Adults eat a
lot of food, don't they?

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <PARENT>. It's easy to move around
now that my body's fully grown. Helping
with farm work is a cinch now.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You won't believe this, <PARENT>. When I
walk around town now, nobody recognizes
me.
<PAGE>
It's really fun! I feel like I'm in a
new town.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<PARENT>, <PARENT>! When you get bigger, it's
easier to hit your head, isn't it? I
just hit my head in the doorway.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<PARENT>, <PARENT>! Adults don't get very
sleepy, do they? I find it strange.
<PAGE>
At this hour I would have been really
sleepy when I was a child.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Goodnight, <PARENT>. I'm going to stay up
a little longer. Don't worry, I'll go to
sleep soon.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Welcome back, <PARENT>. Your work seems
pretty tough. Do you want me to massage
your shoulders?

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The weather's nice, isn't it, <PARENT>?
Hey, I've got a great idea.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Do you want to race? I think I could
beat you now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Huh? Maybe next time? Aww. I wish we
could race now!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Rain is boring, isn't it? That's one
thing that hasn't changed since I've
gotten bigger. I hope it stops soon.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<PARENT>, do you want to go swimming in
the river? I think I could keep up with
you now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>Huh? Maybe next time? Aww. I wish we
could do it now!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<PARENT>, <PARENT>! How's the farm? I mean,
it's raining, so if you need help with
something, just let me know.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Food tastes good in the fall. Don't you
agree? Now that I'm bigger, I  can
really eat a lot.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<PARENT>, rain is good for the plants,
right?
<PAGE>
Does that mean that it's good if it
keeps raining forever? I can't really
get my head around it.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<PARENT>, now that I'm bigger, I can
finally make a huge snowman. Being
big sure is awesome!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Will the snow stop falling soon? I want
to make a snowman with you, <PARENT>. The
two of us could make a gigantic one!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<PARENT>, even though I'm bigger now,
typhoons are still really scary.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<PARENT>, after the snow stops falling, I'll
help you shovel it off the roof. I think
I'm finally big enough to  do it now.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
There are shortcuts in the forest that I
can't use anymore now that my body is
bigger. Being big has its downsides too.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Climbing trees is much easier now that
I'm bigger!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>But I can't climb onto thin branches
anymore because they'd break if I did.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've gotten good at catching fish with
my hands! Now that my body's bigger, my
hands are bigger too.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Being tall is nice. All I have to do is
reach up to grab fruit to eat from the
branches.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Now that I'm bigger, I'm much faster. I
can run over here in no time. Being an
adult is awesome!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Maybe I'll go swim in the lake... Nah,
I'd better not. The old lady will get
mad at me if I do.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<PARENT>, do you need help with anything?
I can do pretty everything now! If you
need help, just let me know, okay?

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Helping you with stuff is really fun,
<PARENT>. I'm enjoying the farm more and
more now.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
The mine was pretty scary was when I
was small. Actually, it's still a little
scary even though I'm much bigger now.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<PARENT>, did you find the mineral that
you were looking for? I hope you find a
a ton of it!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<PARENT>, why aren't there more people
here in town? I wish there were more
people to play with!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Who should I play with today? Who do
you think, <PARENT>? You can come along
too, <PARENT>!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Who should I play with today? Who do
you think, <PARENT>? You can come along
too, <PARENT>!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Who should I play with today? Who do
you think, <PARENT>? You can come along
too, <PARENT>!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Yeah, it's good to be bigger now, but
there are downsides too. I guess I'll
just have to get used to some things.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Now when I go exploring, my body gets
caught in narrow paths and shortcuts
through the forest.
<PAGE>
It's tough to go exploring now that I'm
grown. I need to figure something out.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now that I'm bigger, it's easier for me
to help with the farm work. I might even
be able to work as much as you, <PARENT>.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
My friends were all surprised when they
saw me! Now they all want adult candy
too!
<PAGE>
They can't have any? Really? Aww, I'm
sure they're all going to be
disappointed.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you, <PARENT>! You've made my dream
of becoming bigger a reality. I'll help
out around the farm as much as I can!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When the people in the town saw me, they
asked if I'd just moved here.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>When I told them that it's me, <CHILD_NAME>,
the old ladies were shocked.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<PARENT>, it's thanks to you that I've
been able to grow this big. I really
appreciate all that you've done for me.
<PAGE>
There are so many things that I want to
do now that I'm bigger... And I'm going
to do them all!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<PARENT>'s pancakes! No matter how big I
get, I'll always love these. Yum!
They're so tasty!
<PAGE>
Next time, I'll try making pancakes
myself. Now that I'm bigger, I should be
able to do it, right?

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I present for me? Wow! <PARENT>, thank
you!
<PAGE>
Time to dig in! Oh, delicious! I just
better be careful not to eat too much.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yay! A present! Even though I'm an adult
now, getting presents still makes me
happy.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Even though I'm an adult, I still don't
don't like this one bit.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
What's wrong with you, <PARENT>?! I didn't
get bigger just so you could torture me
like this!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Grilled pumpkin?! I thought I might be
able to eat this now that I'm an adult,
but I still can't stand it.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow! That's a big watermelon. It must
have been difficult to bring it here.
<PAGE>
I'll help you carry it next time. Now
let's hurry up and eat this thing.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's really big. You grew this, didn't
you, <PARENT>? Can you teach me how to
grow these?

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Whoa! It's amazing! You're a master
farmer, <PARENT>! I've never seen a
watermelon this big!
<PAGE>
Even if everyone in the town has some,
there'll still probably be leftovers.
You're amazing, <PARENT>.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
That's huge. I would have had to drag
it when I was young, but now I can carry
it!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thanks, <PARENT>, but I don't need
anything now.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Umm, I can't carry that much. Maybe
next time, okay?

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present? For me? Yay! Thank
you! What did you get me?
<PAGE>
<PARENT>'s pancakes! Yum! They're super
tasty!
<PAGE>
Next time, I'll make some for you if ya
teach me how to make 'em first.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present? For me? Yay! Thank
you! What did you get me?
<PAGE>
Whoa, that looks good. I'm going to go
ahead and dig in!
<PAGE>
Yum, this is good! I love my birthday.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present? For me? Yay! Thank
you! What did you get me?
<PAGE>
Thanks, <PARENT>! Now that I'm older, I
was worried that I might not get
birthday presents anymore.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present? For me? Yay! Thank
you! What did you get me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Thanks, <PARENT>. I'm so happy right now!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present? For me? Yay! Thank
you! What did you get me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Come on, <PARENT>. You know I hate this,
right? Are you kidding? Where's my real
present?

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present? For me? Yay! Thank
you! What did you get me?
<PAGE>
How could you give me this on my
birthday? Haven't I been a good son? I-I
hate you, <PARENT>!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present? For me? Yay! Thank
you! What did you get me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Just because I'm bigger doesn't mean I
can eat grilled pumpkin! Give me
something else already!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present? For me? Yay! Thank
you! What did you get me?
<PAGE>
Whoa! A giant watermelon. It must have
been difficult to harvest something this
big. I'll be sure to enjoy every bite.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present? For me? Yay! Thank
you! What did you get me?
<PAGE>
This thing is huge! Thanks! Please cook
it up for me later!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present? For me? Yay! Thank
you! What did you get me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Wow! A giant watermelon! I appreciate
this a lot, but if I can't eat it all,
can you help me finish it, <PARENT>?

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present? For me? Yay! Thank
you! What did you get me?
<PAGE>
Wow! This thing is enormous! I'm sure
you can make a lot of food with this.
Please cook it up for me later!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Chicks look even smaller now that I've
gotten bigger.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I used to struggle to lift up this
chicken but now it's easy!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let me try to lift this chicken! Here we
go... Whew! She was pretty heavy, but I
was able to manage it!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ha ha ha. Do you know who I am? It's me,
<CHILD_NAME>. Ah, so it looks like you do
remember me.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<PARENT>, can I take this dog for a walk?
Some serious exercise is in order. The
little guy can barely move.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
If I had a race with this dog now, I
wonder if I could win. We'll have to
find out later.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This dog won't even try to move unless
you push from behind. We've gotta get
the little guy some more exercise.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This cat comes to my bed sometimes but
gets surprised upon seeing how big I am.
Gets used to me pretty soon though.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This cat has a jiggly belly and seems to
get really happy when given a massage.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
No matter how many times I pet this cat,
it always feels good.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Come here, you. I can hold this cat now
too, but the little guy sure is heavy.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Is this flower for me? Thank you. I'll
use it for decoration.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thanks, <PARENT>! Now that I'm bigger,
I was afraid I wouldn't get any Pumpkin
Festival candy this year.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The blue feather is something you can
use when you're an adult, right? So can
I use it now?
<PAGE>
No? Why not? Why are you so quiet all of
a sudden?

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Rings are pretty, but I don't know what
purpose they serve. What exactly do you
use them for?

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You caught one too, <PARENT>? I catch them
a lot. It's fun, isn't it?

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Even though I look different, I guess it
can tell who I am by my smell. It
tickles when it licks my finger.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This turtle is pretty big. Even though
I'm bigger now myself, I still feel like
I could ride on it.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<PARENT>... give me your hand. Don't ask
why. Just do it!
<PAGE>
Here, this is a birthday present from
me! I hope you like it.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I'm sorry, <PARENT>. I wasn't able to get
a birthday present for you...

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<PARENT>... are you going to stop talking
to me now that I'm bigger? Come on,
let's talk more!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Yay! It's the ocean! Hey, can I go
swimming by myself?
<PAGE>
Now that I'm grown, I want to try going
out there alone!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is that turtle over there the same
turtle that we always see in that spot?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Now that I'm bigger, a lot of things
look smaller than they used to!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Check this out, <PARENT>! I'm going to try
to climb that palm tree over there!
<PAGE>
What? I can't because it's too
dangerous? Aww, that's no fun.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Now that I'm bigger, I'm not afraid of
ghosts anymore!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>W-Well I guess I'm a little scared. 
N-No, I mean, I'm not scared... I'm not
scared at all.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The mask on the wall there is actually
quite interesting, when you look at it
closely.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You know, I climbed to the very top of
those stairs!
<PAGE>
It was really high, and I could see
mountains that are super far away!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ahaha! I can reach the branches of the
cherry trees now!
<PAGE>
Check it out, <PARENT>! Aren't I amazing!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, <PARENT>! If you're going to go
fishing, can I come with you?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>You always look like you're having so
much fun when you're fishing. I want to
try too. It's okay, right?

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hmm. Hmm. Hm hm hmm. Hmm!
<PAGE>
Now that I'm bigger, everything looks
different. It's a lot of fun.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Alright! I'm going to make a big
snowman!
<PAGE>
You just watch, <PARENT>! I can do it all
by myself now.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Let's have a snowball fight, <PARENT>!
Here we go!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah, ah, ahchoo! Uhhh.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>It-It's nothing! I'm just fine! Okay?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Come on! Let's keep playing!

<PARENT>... Don't worry... I'm an adult
now... I won't wet the bed anymore.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
My body feels sluggish. Maybe I caught a
cold.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <PARENT>. Do you want some help
tomorrow?

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh. That's too bad. Maybe next time
then.

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Great! You can count on me to work hard!

<FACE_SON><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The food is so good today that I'm
afraid I'll eat too much and get fat.
Now's not the time to give a present.
